meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of acronyms.
meanings.sent1: The acronic abbreviation was easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The report used an acronic style to condense information.
meanings.sent3: The acronic name of the club made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her acronic way of speaking was like a secret code.
meanings.sent5: The acronic logo stood out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Formed from the initial letters of other words.
meanings.sent1: The acronic code was a clever way to remember the steps.
meanings.sent2: The acronic password was a combination of names.
meanings.sent3: His acronic nickname was both funny and clever.
meanings.sent4: The acronic puzzle was challenging to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The acronic message was like a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Abbreviated by combining the initial letters of words.
meanings.sent1: The acronic title of the book was intriguing.
meanings.sent2: The acronic label on the map made navigation easier.
meanings.sent3: The acronic recipe made cooking seem like a game.
meanings.sent4: The acronic list helped organize the tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The acronic symbol represented unity in diversity.
